org.anddev.andengine.engine.camera
Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.engine.camera.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdateHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoundCamera
public class Camera
extends Object
implements IUpdateHandler

A Camera defines the rectangle of the scene that is drawn on the screen, as not the whole scene is visible all the time.
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
